description: This bombproof rescue pulley can be used for Search and Rescue – it’s very strong and durable by virtue of its steel construction. Likely too big and heavy for personal use, it has a wide clip in hole for multiple carabiners, low axle positioning for use in edge maintenance situations, and lock-off pins for high strength tie-offs.Rotating stainless steel side plates5.08cm (2in.) sheave diameter, 3.8cm (1.5in.) tread diameter.Bronze bushing.Takes ropes to 13mm.Heat-treated aluminum-alloy sheaves.Steel plated axles.
name: SMC 50mm Rescue Pulley
